mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.teacher_no, t.user_id, u.username, u.name, t.department_id, d.name AS department_name, t.title, t.gender, CASE t.gender WHEN 0 THEN '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女' END AS gender_desc, t.id_card, t.birthday, t.entry_date, t.status, CASE t.status WHEN 0 THEN '在职' WHEN 1 THEN '离职' WHEN 2 THEN '退休' END AS status_desc, u.email, u.phone, u.avatar, t.create_time, t.update_time FROM teacher t JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id JOIN department d ON t.department_id = d.id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_offering WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId}) AS course_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_offering WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND status = 0) AS active_course_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_offering WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND status = 1) AS completed_course_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_selection cs JOIN course_offering co ON cs.course_offering_id = co.id WHERE co.teacher_id = #{teacherId}) AS student_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN course_offering co ON a.course_offering_id = co.id WHERE co.teacher_id = #{teacherId}) AS attendance_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN course_offering co ON a.course_offering_id = co.id WHERE co.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND a.status = 0) AS attendance_normal_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN course_offering co ON a.course_offering_id = co.id WHERE co.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND a.status = 1) AS attendance_absent_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN course_offering co ON a.course_offering_id = co.id WHERE co.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND a.status = 2) AS attendance_late_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN course_offering co ON a.course_offering_id = co.id WHERE co.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND a.status = 3) AS attendance_early_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN course_offering co ON a.course_offering_id = co.id WHERE co.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND a.status = 4) AS attendance_leave_count
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_offering WHERE id = #{courseId} AND teacher_id = #{teacherId}
SELECT t.id AS value, u.name AS label FROM teacher t JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE t.status = 0 ORDER BY u.name

SELECT t.id AS value, u.name AS label FROM teacher t JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE t.status = 0
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY u.name LIMIT 10
